ageVerification.title: Age Verification
ageVerification.message: You must be 18 years or older to enter this site.

header.description: Discover, track, and share your cigar experiences with a vibrant community of enthusiasts.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for your cigar journey

items.title: Personal Collections
items.description: Manage your humidor inventory, organize wishlists and favorites, and track your cigar journey.

items.title: Reviews & Ratings
items.description: Share detailed tasting notes, rate cigars, and discover what the community loves.

items.title: Social Experience
items.description: Follow enthusiasts, share collections, and connect with a global cigar community.

items.title: Expert Insights
items.description: Access professional reviews, detailed cigar information, and curated recommendations.

items.title: Offline Access
items.description: Access your entire collection and notes anytime, anywhere - no internet required.

items.title: Discover & Search
items.description: Browse a growing number of cigars with advanced filters by brand, strength, origin, and price.

discover.title: Experience Cigarrynos
discover.subtitle: Explore the features that make your cigar journey unforgettable

download.title: Get Started Today
download.subtitle: Available on iOS and Android platforms

restriction.mainDescription: Access to this website and application is restricted to individuals who are of legal age to purchase and consume tobacco products in their jurisdiction of residence.

importantInfo.title: Important Information
items: You must be at least 18 years old to access this website and use the Cigarrynos application.
By accessing this website or using the application, you confirm that you are of legal age in your jurisdiction.
We maintain strict age verification procedures to ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.intro: In accordance with international regulations and local laws governing tobacco-related products and services:
items: Age verification is mandatory for all users.
False declarations regarding age may result in account termination.
Users must comply with all applicable local laws and regulations regarding tobacco products.

restriction.warning: If you are under the legal age, please exit this website immediately.
